data.eml:eml: Two new species of sand-bubbler crabs, Scopimera, from North China and the Philippines (Crustacea: Decapoda: Dotillidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wong, Kingsley J. H., Shih, Hsi-Te, Chan, Benny K. K. (2011): Two new species of sand-bubbler crabs, Scopimera, from North China and the Philippines (Crustacea: Decapoda: Dotillidae). Zootaxa 2962: 21-35, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207150
